Text:
File scanned on several sites. Report in the description was done here.

http://virusscan.jotti.org/

Remember to play it safe with activation!
Please nothing that works for encore cs3 ?
This keygen generates valid serial numbers, but NOT activation codes. Not for me anyway, I had to use the good ol' master collection keygen minus the last four digits to activate my suite.
hey has this release's licenses expired for anyone?  Thanks

You guys that can't activate it are doing it all wrong!

This does indeed create a serial number. You then choose activate by phone, paste the request code Adobe gives you to the generator and click Generate Activation.

I have a full license using this keygen. For you guys having trouble, make sure you delete the cache.db file before trying to activate. Unplug your modem as well.
@ Vathral:  How do you get the Activation code then? I gave the automated phone my serial, but it asked for activation code as well.

All The Adobe CS3 keygens are suspicious. I downloaded both the master and production keygens. The production keygen seems Ok and creates a working key but I noticed it copies itself to c:\windows\prefetch and system restore.

The master keygen definitely has a trojan (Backdoor.Win32.Rbot.gen), even though Kaspersky internet suite 7. nod32, avg anti spyware, and outpost 4 didn't detect anything. Try running it to see what I mean. Only then do the anti virus scanners detect it, but by then it's too late as it's already written to your registry and c:\windows directory and creates a file called WTemp_01.exe. :(

Doesn't look any of the best Anti-virus scanners can yet detect this trojan, so be careful.
So, is there no way to use the keygen if you downloaded a trial?
Where can I find the cache.db file?

anyone know why i keep gettin this msg when the install is done

SUMMARY
succesfully installed 1 component
shared component
ERRORS: 2 components
Adobe CS3 components install failed
shared component component install failed.

i tried many times n different ones and i also did the adobe cs3 clean script...any one know how i can fix this
I am new to this - but I downloaded four .uif files and now I do not know what to do to install the programs.

Seems like it really is trojan and virus free!

The master keygen definately has a trojan though. My ani-virus blocked it.
